verbs.description: TOKYO ( AP ) — North Korea [V: has] lobbed another verbal salvo at Washington ahead of an increasingly embattled plan for its leader , Kim Jong Un , and President Donald Trump to meet next

TOKYO ( AP ) — [ARG0: North Korea] has [V: lobbed] [ARG1: another verbal salvo] [ARG2: at Washington] [ARGM-TMP: ahead of an increasingly embattled plan for its leader , Kim Jong Un , and President Donald Trump to meet next]

TOKYO ( AP ) — North Korea has lobbed another verbal salvo at Washington ahead of an [ARGM-ADV: increasingly] [V: embattled] plan for its leader , Kim Jong Un , and President Donald Trump to meet next

TOKYO ( AP ) — North Korea has lobbed another verbal salvo at Washington ahead of an increasingly embattled plan for its leader , Kim Jong Un , and [ARG0: President Donald Trump] to [V: meet] [ARGM-TMP: next]
